OK, so you don't know what the "scene" is. Do some researc; ask around. You are telling me that you would prefer if these great scene releases were not uploaded to torrent sites? Fucking fool. Welcome to the PIRATE bay.

And I repeat, there is nothing harmful in any of my torrents. I am not an "impudent idiot", sir. You are an impetuous, ignorant child who knows little. Those zip and url files are harmless, and I'm sorry if the Chinese symbols scare you, but don't worry... they won't bite ;)

Dispite this petty quarreling the film is amasing, and big thumbs up on the quality GoodFilms, I watched it off a PS3 on a 42" TV.

Thanks :)
